description:
Nirvana fired on Caitshelter! But, in the nick of time, Hibiki and the others appear in the magical bomber Christina, and block the attack.  And furthermore, they know the way that Nirvana can be stopped!  Hibiki tells everyone that the way to stop Nirvana is to destroy the lacrima in each of the six legs simultaneously. Everyone is covered in battle wounds, but they still haven`t given up hope! Can Natsu and the gang stop Zero`s evil ambitions?
Source: crunchyroll
